law.catch_line: Additional court costs for the Juvenile Assessment Center.

text.section:
Sec. 11-6. Additional court costs for the Juvenile Assessment Center.
The provisions of Section 775.0833, Florida Statutes, are approved and adopted by this Board and incorporated by reference into this section. The Clerk of the Circuit and County Court, Eleventh Judicial Circuit and the County Manager are requested and directed to comply with the terms and provisions of this statute.
Section 775.0833, Florida Statutes, provides that in those counties wherein the Sheriff and the Department of Juvenile Justice have entered into such agreement, the County may adopt a mandatory court cost to be assessed in specific cases by adopting an ordinance which incorporates by reference the provisions of Section 775.0833 which provide for the collection of such costs by the Clerk of the Court and the disbursement of such funds as needed for the implementation and operation of the Juvenile Assessment Center.
